analyzed: ārya vajravidāraṇā nāma dhāraṇī
om namaḥ bhagavatyai ārya vajra vidāraṇāyai

original: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasmin samaye bhagavān vajreṣu viharati sma /
analyzed: evam mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān vajreṣu viharati sma

original: sarvaśarīraṃ vajramayamadhiṣṭhāya vajrapāṇiśca buddhānubhāvena vajrasamādhiṃ samāpannaḥ /
analyzed: sarva śarīram vajra mayam adhiṣṭhāya vajrapāṇiḥ ca buddha anubhāvena vajra samādhim samāpannaḥ

original: tato vajrapāṇiḥ [sarva]buddhānubhāvena sarvabuddhādhiṣṭhānaṃ [sarvabodhisattvādhiṣṭhā]nañca mahākrodhasambhūtaṃ vajrasāramabhāṣate sma /
analyzed: tatas vajrapāṇiḥ sarva buddha anubhāvena sarva buddha adhiṣṭhānam sarva bodhisattva adhiṣṭhānam ca mahā krodha sambhūtam vajrasāram abhāṣate sma

original: acchedyamabhedyaṃ satyaṃ dṛḍhaṃ sthiraṃ sarvatrāpratihataṃ sarvatrāparājitaṃ sarvasattvavidrāvaṇakaraṃ
analyzed: acchedyam abhedyam satyam dṛḍham sthiram sarvatra apratihatam sarvatra aparājitam sarva sattva vidrāvaṇa karam
sarva sattva utsādana karam sarva vidyā chedana karam sarva vidyā stambhana karam sarva karma vidhvaṃsana karam
sarva karma vidrāvaṇa karam sarva graha utsādana karam sarva graha vimokṣaṇa karam sarva bhūta ākarṣaṇa karam
sarva bhūta nigrahaṇa karam sarva vidyā mantra karma parāyaṇa karam asiddhānām siddha karam
siddhānām ca a vināśana karam sarva kāma pradāna karam sarva sattvānām rakṣaṇa karam śāntikam

original: pauṣṭikaṃ sarvasattvānāñca stambhanakaraṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca mohanakaram imaṃ mantraṃ
analyzed: pauṣṭikam sarva sattvānām ca stambhana karam sarva sattvānām ca mohana karam imam mantram
mahā valam buddha anubhāvena yakṣa indraḥ vajrapāṇiḥ pratyabhāṣat
om namaḥ ratnatrayāya
namaḥ caṇḍa vajrapāṇaye
mahā yakṣa senāpataye

original: tadyathā - om truṭa truṭa troṭaya troṭaya sphuṭa sphuṭa sphoṭaya sphoṭaya ghurṇa ghurṇa ghurṇāpaya (Vvdh_162)

original: ghurṇāpaya sarvasattvānāṃ vibodhaya vibodhaya sambodhaya sambodhaya bhrama bhrama
analyzed: ghurṇāpaya sarva sattvānām vibodhaya vibodhaya sambodhaya sambodhaya bhrama bhrama

analyzed: vajra maṭa vajra vajra matha vajra vajra aṭṭahāsa nīla vajra su vajrāya svāhā

original: om he fullu nirufullu nigṛhṇa kullu mili cullu kuru kullu vajravijayāya svāhā /

analyzed: om kaṭa kaṭa maṭa maṭa raṭa raṭa moṭana pramoṭanāya svāhā

original: om hulu hulu tiṣṭha tiṣṭha bandha bandha hana hana amṛte hūṃ phaṭ /
analyzed: om hulu hulu tiṣṭha tiṣṭha bandha bandha hana hana amṛte hūm phaṭ
hṛdaya upahṛdaya mūlamantraḥ
sarva pāpa kṣayam kṛtvā sarva duḥkha vināśanam
mūlam tat sarva mantrāṇām sarva śrī samalaṅkṛtam
upaśānta indriyaḥ bhūtvā naṣṭa āśraya hata āyuṣaḥ
alakṣmyā pariviṣṭāḥ ca devatāḥ ca parāṅmukhāḥ
kāntā priya viyoge ca duṣṭa grahaḥ upadrutaḥ
anyonyānām artha nāśam tathā vyasanam eva ca
śoka āyāsa upadrutānām bhaya vyasanam eva ca
graha nakṣatra pīḍāḥ vā kākhordāḥ dāruṇāḥ grahāḥ
pāpakam paśyate svapne śoka āyāsa samucchritam
tat ca su snāta śucinā śrotavyam sūtram uttamam
śṛṇvantu ye te
idam sūtram gambhīram buddha gocaram
prasanna citta sumanāḥ śuci vastraiḥ alaṅkṛtāḥ

original: te ca sarve ca duṣṭātmā upasargā sudāruṇāḥ //
analyzed: te ca sarve ca duṣṭa ātmā upasargāḥ su dāruṇāḥ
tejaḥ sya ca praśāmyeta samastā sarvam āpnutā
āyuḥ ca barddhate puṇyam sarva pāpaiḥ vimokṣitā
maṇi sarṣapa dūrvābhiḥ ratna akṣata sa candanaiḥ
vajra granthita puṣpaiḥ ca jala āmāpūrya kāñcanam

original: ghaṭaṃ tu rajataṃ cāpi śucivastreṇa vāsitam /
analyzed: ghaṭam tu rajatam ca api śuci vastreṇa vāsitam
ekaviṃśati vāram vā tathā ca aṣṭa uttaraṃśatam

original: japedvidāraṇaṃ mantraṃ yaḥ snāyāt pārthivaḥ sadā /
analyzed: japet vidāraṇam mantram yaḥ snāyāt pārthivaḥ sadā

original: evaṃ yaḥ kurute nityaṃ tasya sampadyate śubham //
analyzed: evam yaḥ kurute nityam tasya sampadyate śubham

original: idamavocad bhagavānāttamanāste ca bhikṣavaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti
analyzed: idam avocat bhagavān ātta manāḥ te ca bhikṣavaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣad sa deva mānuṣa asura garuḍa gandharvaḥ ca lokaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāṣitam abhyanandan iti
ārya vajravidāraṇā nāma dhāraṇī samāptā
